title: ADC mains lie, but don't worry i'll tell you
body:
i'll tell you the real truth about this meta

yeah, supports are broken that's quite true, janna is broken right now
but who broke them? support themselves? non-fcking sense

**adcs are the one who broke supports**

ardent? that shit was fine a couple of patches ago
everything was fine as long as adcs weren't broken themselves

then riot nerfed tank itemization destroying juggernauts, buffed IE and other shit, buffed adcs so hard because adc mains were 6 years old
and now? it's cancer

yes i'm a support main, i'm blitz/thresh only player
no i don't find janna'**S KIT** broken, it is the same it used to be months ago when ardent was considered balanced.
**nobody gave a shit about ardent** when assassins were fine, nobody cared about what ardent did, and because you cried so hard and now you can outduel a zed, ardent is broken and needs to be gutted to make the game better

all of this wouldn't have happened in the first place if we didn't nerf assassins+nerfed bruisers+buffed tanks+buffed adcs+nerfed caster adcs at the same time

but you think you can band aid this game by nerfing ardent? just wait and see if marksmen will finally be out of the meta once 

LUL

replies.body:
Yeah preseason six threw reasonable balance out the window, favoring marksmen while nerfing anything that could challenge them; but ardent isn't the sole item that skewed the balance. 

Redemption and knight's vow were overtuned bandaids, to the problem of supports being unable to survive long enough for impacting teamfights. 

Phantom dancer was already a core item on most marksmen, and riot tacked on damage reduction to it ontop of a movement speed bonus for when someone gets close; making them able to kite and duel anyone that lacked an immediate gap closer or longer range.

Added a a mini-bloodthirster that has cooldown reduction and delays damage taken, allowing them to lifesteal through burst that would've killed them otherwise. Not to mention it's addition was spiteful against mages, as it allows them to heal off of abilities, when they already get massive heals from critical hits. Death's dance was a niche item until riot buffed it, mages had survivability until they deleted wota; neither were surprising.

Buffed other niche items by granting even more critical chance. I remember when a marksman had to choose if they wanted 100% criticals or some tactical options such as armor penetration or lifesteal, but that choice isn't a problem now. You can reach 100% in 4 items, and not even a specific set either, you can swap out a few as you like.

They also were given alternatives of several items to assist them. Want to chunk multiple enemies at a time, pick up hurricane or static shiv. Want to shred tanks, now you can with excessive force or sustain removal. Want to drain your way through any encounter, five items to choose from, each with different extra effects. Want to counter mages, you can deny their crowd control or have a backup shield without sacrificing offensive power. Want to play as a hit and run champion, rapidfire cannon and phantom dancer can help with that. 

The essence reaver was a rarely seen item as it was a counterpart to manamune, restoring a meager percentage of mana on every auto-attack; but was changed to only work off of critical hits, and grant more cooldown reduction based on your critical hit chance, making it the only item that can bring 30% cdr by itself! Normally wouldn't be a problem except that said patch also reworked several marksmen to give them some safety ability.
Game until Season 5 = Morello as Lead Balancer, Season 6 = Meddler and Ghostcrawler Lead Balancers

> [{quoted}](name=What Is Smite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-08-25T06:01:02.069+0000)
>
> Game until Season 5 = Morello as Lead Balancer, Season 6 = Meddler and Ghostcrawler Lead Balancers

Morello hated healers for good reason. He probably hates mass shielding as well. As soon as he leaves the lead balance team, shields and heals are added to support items everywhere in the next preseason lol
Ghostcrawler is not on the balance team.

> [{quoted}](name=Im ur Blitzcrank,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-08-24T18:52:54.272+0000)
>
> then riot buffed IE and other shit

i want to stress this part.

they recently buffed crit items. adc being as retarded as they are doesnt only come from the fact that support items in their design favour them. (though its part of the problem)

its not even just the recent buffs. adc itemization has power creeped over the years in cost reductions and additional defenses added without removing offense to compensate.

it used to be that adc were forced to build 4 ad/crit/attack speed items + zerkers + 1 defensive item to be effective.

now that they have added so much defensive shit on marksmen items, they can get away without sacrificing an item slot for survivability.

Remember when ADCs actually had to sacrifice damage for survivability?

"Don't worry guys, we've tacked on 40 AD to GA, changed the build path to favour you and screw over everyone else that built it!" - Riot.

This entire season has been centred around balancing for the ADC class, and I'm done with the favouritism. 

The fact that supports and support items are being scapegoated for it is unhinged. While yes, censer IS a factor, to pretend that alone is THE single most, biggest issue is insane. Nothing will change.

Edit: There's a scapegoating ADC lurking. BEGONE! {{item:3075}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3075}}
{{item:3072}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3156}}  "Guys I sacrifice survivablity for my damage!"
Hey look, a build with only 1 crit item or no boots.
Holy heckers. You're apparently a darius main, a morde main, a thresh main, and a janna main.

Yep
leagueofgraph also ranks me top15 blitz world

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/summoners/blitzcrank

got a problem?

Thats nice if LoG is accurate. 

Although its nicer to know I'm not blacklisted.

that's cuz i'm on my smurf

let me fixe that

u know id like to get d5 before season end but literally 95% of games are decided by bot lane. 
autofilled adc = dodge or lose and its cancer af xd


maybe i should just play adc myself lul
It really doesn't matter unless you are excessively bad at being able to lane as an ADC. Even an offrole could manage to pick up enough farm, and if he out-teamcomps then late game isn't hard either.
But not vs an adc main. and the type of autofilled adcs i get in plat 1 - d5 are uh... very interesting xd
play Kog, no skill needed

ye but still not enuff ip feelsbadman

i want my elo

You said ADCs are broken.
Which ADCs are you primarily talking about?
Are you saying all ADCs are broken or only some?
I would like to know your opinion on that.

trist kog twitch are the strongest

but it doesn't matter
as long as you pick an adc, you can't die with censer knight's vow all the shields heals and other shit
you can reach late game with 2 items.
then you proced to single handly decide the game, because everything is around you now
even divers build supports with locket stoneplate and knight's vow

only mages can get to deal damage on their own

and that wasn't a problem months ago, because tank itemization was strong allowing bruisers+offensive tanks like poppy to be strong
and of course, without talking about assassins

thanks for fizz leblanc kata talon kha rengar nerfs

Kog isn't OP though? 

He is as he has been ever since his mini revert.


He only ever get's strong with a strong team around to protect him, which is how he´s always been, he was the first marksman that people made dedicated teams to protect.


It was seriously a thing, protect the kog well enough and a team will have a massive power to use at any time-


But on the contrary, he is completely unable to defend himself aside from stumbling around, he is a true hypercarry that carries the absolute and certain handicap of never winning anything 1v1 against a dedicated champ.

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-24T23:19:17.702+0000)

almost 20% pick rate, 52% win rate, 40% ban rate

>
>

stop, just stop

{{item:3153}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3156}}  once he gets this, no one can hope to kill him ever again unless it's 2 or 3 vs 1

What. The. Heck.


If kog builds like that he´ll have shit for damage ._.


No kog will ever build like that,  and what the heck are you on about his banrate? It's less than 4% according to leagueofgraphs, and playrate is 12%

OP.gg claims that he has a 24% banrate, but OP.GG usually has really weird statistics on everything besides winrate and popularity, and even op.gg claims him to have 51% winrate and 13% pickrate. 


None of these numbers except the winrate's are close to what you claimed dude, don't go exaggerating so fricking hard, it pulls the quality of your statements down like a 2 tons rock chained to your foot. 


In fact, the only site i could find that was anywhere close to what you claim was lolking, the statistics for Korea claimed that he as a 56% banrate, a 10% popularity and 49% winrate.

Meaning he get´s banned a ton but still loses most of the times when he does get through.


Korea is famous for having problems with kog scripts too though, in fact nearly all regions have problems with them same as Xerath scrips but difference is that Xerath bots can be outplayed while the Kog bot is insanely hard to deal with.


I´d guess that's why he has a high banrate in high elo, because no one wants to deal with that shit.

https://youtu.be/mfSYfElHxr0?t=299

no damage xd

pls begone

> [{quoted}](name=ITG Ban Yasuo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-24T19:04:26.069+0000)
>
> You said ADCs are broken.
> Which ADCs are you primarily talking about?
> Are you saying all ADCs are broken or only some?
> I would like to know your opinion on that.

The ADC is itemization is broken. All adcs get a massive powerspike at {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} and continue to scale harder and harder to the point where they can start outdueling assassins without kiting. This is further compounded if they have an enchanter support since they multiply their power do a level where if they ged even slightly fed, it takes 4 or 5 people to stop them because the adc is just a massive ball of stats that is ranged.

I see posts like this and I wonder "what kind of matches are they hoping for?"  It's like these boards want Garen bot with Malph support to be meta.  I think I like what Riot is doing better and I wish they'd cater to these boards less.

> [{quoted}](name=i cant move wtf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-08-24T21:35:26.929+0000)
>
> It's like these boards want Garen bot with Malph support to be meta.

SUPPOSING you're right, and i'm saying supposing because it's bull fcking shit

what's wrong with wanting that?

Because either champions are designed for a specific purpose or they're all the same and just some champion's stats are better.  Garen bot being meta would mean that marksmen are completely useless if a garen is able to be the best damage carry as a limited mobility melee.

garen specific purpose is being a juggernaut that kills everyone

him going bot means that marksmen went balanced and that we get to choose our damage option in the game

And why is he good top lane and not bot?  Because in bot he'll get kited early and can't farm effectively.  What happens if you take ashe top?  It's a solo lane and without a support to peel for her garen could easily outlane in that scenario.  That's why garen top is better than garen bot and both are viable.

> [{quoted}](name=i cant move wtf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-24T21:58:57.536+0000)
>
>  and can't farm effectively.  

and why can't he farm effectively?because range vs melee in this game is imbalanced as soon as xp is shared
and that has always been the case which is why morde got xp passive to be able to go bot

and instead of fixing this issue, riot just gives to champ xp passive now if they want them to go bot LUL

> [{quoted}](name=Im ur Blitzcrank,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=000700000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-24T22:08:29.001+0000)
>
> and why can't he farm effectively?because range vs melee in this game is imbalanced as soon as xp is shared

What do you mean?

the only way you can win against a ranged champion with a melee champion is to wait lvl 3 and all in
but if the xp is shared, by the time you get lvl 3 you got poked to oblivion and cannot lane anymore

this isn't true for morde, he can get lvl 3 quickly before anyone bot with his xp passive
I just hate the fact that adcs have to be THE LATE GAME champs. Like can't Riot find a way to make them balanced in all stages

What the hell does this even mean? Classes are meant to have strengths and weaknesses at different points in the game. ADCs are pretty bad early and very strong late, but squishy the whole time. Assassins and mages are decent early, can have kill pressure at level 6, and then fall off late when tanks exist. Tanks are weak early and scale evenly over the rest of the game based on their items. Juggernauts are strong early, can snowball into mid, and get kited and outdamaged in the late game. Of course there are individuals in these classes that are good at different points (Cassio and Azir are strong late, MF and Lucian are stronger in the early-mid game), but pretty much every class has time-based strengths and weaknesses.

The counterplay to a champion should never be "end the game before they finish two items" - unless they're so useless early/mid that it might as well be a 4v5 until they finish 4 items.

Plus ADCs as a class aren't weak enough early and mid to justify their lategame power.

This shouldn't be based on class. Marksman as a whole shouldn't be late-game focused. There can be early bully ADCs focused on snowballing, mid game ADCs focused on closing quickly, and late game hyper carry ADCs.

Same for every other class.
It was balanced back in S4

> nobody gave a shit about ardent when assassins were fine, nobody cared about what ardent did,

Yeah, it's almost like we never got to see how OP it was because Redemption and Locket were even more OP. Even then support mains were claming those weren't broken when they clearly were.

every support mains knew they were broken, we were forced to build locket and redemption

now?
redemption nerfed? it's the same except you can't rush it anymore, same with locket due to %hp scaling

NOTHING changed, just the order of the build, and yet you tell me that we didn't see how ardent was broken because redemption was broken?
how does that even make sense? if ardent was broken you would see it being broken period, nothing prevented you from seeing ardent being broken janna/lulu/soraka still built it, it still had the same effect but nobody cared if it was broken youwould see people saying "redemption AND ardent are broken"
 redemption has nothing to do with this

> you cried so hard and now you can outduel a zed

...

Fuck Zed honestly.

I prefer this mechanically intensive "group and protect the carry" ADC meta than the fucking retard "press everything and the fastest in the West wins" assassin meta that we had before, a thousand times. God bless.

The number 1 problem of this game isnt imbalance anymore, the real issue is that every marksman can build full AD and become an hypercarry without sacrificing anything. To really fix that you need to either nerf AD (so it stops being the only hypercarry stat), nerf range advantage (even by reworking some champions) or buff Ap/magic damage users (so they can compete with AD in terms of carrying or at least bring something truly unique to the table besides forcing tanks to build that one green item we all know and love). Nerfing marksmen numbers wont do anything except fucking everything once again.

> I prefer this mechanically intensive "group and protect the carry" ADC meta than the fucking retard "press everything and the fastest in the West wins" assassin meta that we had before, a thousand times. God bless.

I'd rather not have a meta where the game is decided by who wins botlane. Not to mention ADC is the most braindead role in the game, having 100% point click dps that's also burst for some fucking reason that makes absolutely no sense. ADCs should be a meme.
I dare you to play nothing but ADC for a week and then to come back to me and tell me how easy it was.

> [{quoted}](name=Dengeden,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=001000000000,timestamp=2017-08-25T05:05:25.264+0000)
>
> I dare you to play nothing but ADC for a week and then to come back to me and tell me how easy it was.

The role is easy. Getting camped because the role is easy and powerful doesn't change that the role is easy. Once you get ahead as the adc you just steamroll the game.
I'm aware that ADCs are pubstompers when the skill level is low but that still requires some knowledge about 2v2s and the ability to CS.

> [{quoted}](name=Dengeden,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7EdtpGg,comment-id=00100000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-25T08:45:14.064+0000)
>
> I'm aware that ADCs are pubstompers when the skill level is low but that still requires some knowledge about 2v2s and the ability to CS.

Not really. Lower elo is all about coin flips and once you get that advantage you can just right click and stat check them.

Yeah sure, until you get in range of an assassin/mage combo and he instagibs you before you can right click. Pro-tip: They arent juggernauts and they actually outrange you.

It is the most demanding role mechanically, even one mistake, one bad click trying to kite, position yourself or dodge a skillshot and you are instantly DEAD.

The "problem" (well, it is not technically a problem if they are supposed to be hypercarries) is that lategame they dont have any counterplay besides killing them, so even if they are very hard to play properly, if you are good you can become unstoppable. If you are some random scrub tho, you will just fuck up and die. A lot.

They are also very support reliant, that may be another problem to be adressed. TBH juggermaw compositions are really stupid right now. But in yoloQ that rarely happens.

I kinda believe most of you don't even know what mechanics are. 
Kiting and positioning has nothing to do with mechanics. 
Animation cancelling, using AA resets properly, stutter stepping and orbwalking/attackmoving those things are mechanics. 
Not getting hit by skillshots and positioning right applies to 80% of the roster. 
Only tanks really don't care about since they need to soak up. Do you think a full damage camille or GP don't need to do the same things as marksmen?

> Kiting has nothing to do with mechanics.

.
> orbwalking/attackmoving those things are mechanics.

?

Sure bro.

Lel no, in low elos where no one knows how to position himself and even the support gives 0 fucks about peeling ADCs are basically free kills.

I would rather play some mage or assassin bot in those elos.
